授業目的: The course aims at strengthening your confidence in using English for communication. By the end of this term, you should have improved your skills in written and oral communication in English.
到達目標: 1) The student can compose and communicate a clearly formulated and persuasive message orally and in writing. 2) The student masters the paragraph format and can present, analyze and discuss information in an academically acceptable format. 3) In oral presentations the participant can convey her/his messages to others.
